text:
e="preserve">David Andrew Ipp AO QC (1938 – 8 October 2020) was a South African-born Australian lawyer and politician. He was the Commissioner of the NSW Independent Commission Against Corruption between 2009 and 2014. Between 1989 to 2002, he was a judge of the Supreme Court of Western Australia. Ipp was born in Johannesburg.
Ipp died in Sydney on 8 October 2020 at the age of 82.
